entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:23 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
